sentences.en: "Was the car inside the garage?" — "No, it was still outside."
sentences.cn: “车在车库里吗？”——“不，还在外面。”

sentences.en: A full report is expected inside three months.
sentences.cn: 完整的报告要在三个月内完成。

sentences.en: About forty prisoners are still barricaded inside the wrecked buildings.
sentences.cn: 仍有大约40名囚犯被困在严重损毁的建筑物中。

sentences.en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
sentences.cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

sentences.en: As soon as we were inside, the rain began to bucket down.
sentences.cn: 我们刚进屋，大雨便倾盆而下。

sentences.en: Carl picked up the book and stuffed it inside his jacket.
sentences.cn: 卡尔把书捡起来塞进自己的夹克里。

sentences.en: Denver has the inside track among 10 sites being considered.
sentences.cn: 丹佛在10个被考虑的地点之中具有优势。

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: He concealed the key inside his tie.
sentences.cn: 他把钥匙藏在领带里面。

sentences.en: He must have come inside to get out of the cold.
sentences.cn: 他肯定是进来避寒的。

sentences.en: He ran his fingers along the inside walls of the box.
sentences.cn: 他用手指摸了摸盒子的内壁。

sentences.en: Her car was locked and the keys were inside.
sentences.cn: 她的车锁上了，钥匙在车里。

sentences.en: I sent the money inside an envelope addressed to Ann.
sentences.cn: 我把钱装在写有安的名字和地址的信封内寄出。

sentences.en: inside of an hour.
sentences.cn: 在1小时以内

sentences.en: Inside the theatre, they were giving a performance of Bizet's Carmen.
sentences.cn: 在剧院里，他们正在演出比才的作品《卡门》。

sentences.en: knew the city inside out.
sentences.cn: 对这个城市非常了解

sentences.en: Make sure you join the queue inside the bank.
sentences.cn: 在银行里一定要排队。

sentences.en: Stein rolled up the paper bag with the money inside.
sentences.cn: 斯坦把装了钱的纸袋卷了起来。

sentences.en: The door had been locked from the inside.
sentences.cn: 门从里面锁上了。

sentences.en: the inside pages of the newspaper
sentences.cn: 报纸的内页

sentences.en: the inside pocket of his jacket
sentences.cn: 他的夹克的内袋

sentences.en: The jewels were locked away inside the safe.
sentences.cn: 珠宝锁入了保险箱。

sentences.en: The tarnish lay thick on the inside of the ring.
sentences.cn: 戒指内侧有一层厚厚的锈斑。

sentences.en: They took the only free table, which was just inside the door.
sentences.cn: 他们在刚进门处的唯一一张空桌子边坐下。

sentences.en: Two days later, they implanted the fertilized eggs back inside me.
sentences.cn: 两天以后，他们把受精卵重新植入了我的体内。

sentences.en: War turns morality inside out: killing and cruelty are virtues.
sentences.cn: 战争颠倒是非：杀戮与残忍成了美德。

sentences.en: wore the sweatshirt inside out.
sentences.cn: 把运动衫反过来穿

words.tran_cn: 内部的人，会员；熟悉内情者

phrases.tran_cn: 【非正式用语】 尽可能完全地；彻底地
处于核心地位：处于自信或有影响的地位

trans.tran_en: in or facing the inner part of something
in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part

trans.tran_cn: 在…里面，在…内部，在某段时间内
trans.tran_en: in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
